channel.title: Hello #dsbox on Data Science Course in a Box
channel.description: Recent content in Hello #dsbox on Data Science Course in a Box

item.title: Hello #dsbox
item.description: Hello! And welcome! Let’s start with setting up an RStudio Cloud workspace for your class, creating a GitHub organization, and the course website. We also discuss alternative setups for a similar course using some or all of the materials provided here.
